entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 4:30 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow this evening. Periods of snow over higher terrain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
